title: Student Performance Forecasting using CatBoost
features: Developed an end‑to‑end ML pipeline leveraging CatBoost to forecast student performance, reducing RMSE by 12 % versus baseline models.
Engineered features through rigorous EDA—handling missing data, encoding categoricals, and creating interaction terms—boosting model F1‑score by 8 %.
Deployed the trained model as a Flask‑based REST API, enabling real‑time predictions for educational stakeholders and accelerating data‑driven decision making.
